quotes: May the love of those around you provide comfort and peace during this difficult time.
Those we love don't go away, they walk beside us every day. Unseen, unheard, but always near.
There are no goodbyes for us. Wherever you are, you will always be in my heart.
Grief is the price we pay for love. The depth of your sorrow reflects the depth of your love.
What we have once enjoyed we can never lose; all that we love deeply becomes a part of us.
While words may fail to ease your pain, may you find comfort in knowing others care.
May memories of your loved one bring you comfort and strength in the days ahead.
The song may have ended, but the melody lingers on. Their memory will live forever in your heart.
There are no words to express the sorrow I feel for your loss. Please know I am thinking of you.
When someone you love becomes a memory, that memory becomes a treasure that lives on forever.
May you find peace and comfort in the loving memories you shared.
Those who live in the hearts of those they leave behind never truly die.
The pain of parting is nothing compared to the joy of having loved so deeply.
Though your loved one is gone, their spirit lives on in the beautiful memories they've left behind.
May the outpouring of love from those who care bring you some measure of comfort.
In the night of death, hope sees a star, and listening love can hear the rustle of a wing.
No farewell words were spoken, no time to say goodbye. You were gone before we knew it, and only God knows why.
What is lovely never dies, but passes into another loveliness, star-dust or sea-foam, flower or song.
The life of the dead is placed in the memory of the living. Keep their memory alive in your heart.
When you lose someone you love, you gain an angel you know. May their guidance bring you peace.
